meanings.definition: A board or molding at the base of a wall.
meanings.sent1: The baseboards in the room were painted white.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally kicked the baseboards while moving the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the baseboards as a scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the baseboards of our friendship.
meanings.sent5: The baseboards creaked softly as we tiptoed past.

meanings.definition: The lowest part or edge of something.
meanings.sent1: Dust had collected along the baseboards of the old cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed swiftly along the baseboards of the valley.
meanings.sent3: The baseboards of the cake were the most delicious part.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the baseboards of the choir, grounding the harmony.
meanings.sent5: The baseboards of the cliff were eroded by the crashing waves.
